message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to start with an initial offer of $15,000 for the product.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand that $12,000 is your maximum budget, Bob, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. My counteroffer is $13,500 for the product.

I understand that you need to make a profit, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to compromise, so I'll meet you halfway between $12,000 and $13,500. My counteroffer is $12,750 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm still not sure if we're at the optimal price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $12,750 and $13,500, but I'd like to add a small premium for the value I bring to the table. My counteroffer is $13,250 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $13,250. I think this is a fair price for the product, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal here.

I understand that you're close to making a decision, Bob, but I'm not ready to give up yet. I'm willing to make one final push to meet your needs. I'm going to reduce my price by $250, so my new offer is $13,000 for the product. This is my last offer, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal here.

I appreciate your willingness to make a final push, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $12,000. I'm willing to meet you at $12,000, and I think that's a fair price for the product. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal here.
